item.title: Phishing
item.description: SMTP/email Deepsea quickly test commmands - Tow methods: templated and hand-rolled cd ./test/deepsea nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml content inline nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml content multipart - create DB and load from CSV ./result/bin/deepsea -t nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml storage -D test/deepsea/template.db manager -T createtable - load CSV nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.yaml storage -d ./template.db load -s ./marks.csv - show loaded marks of table nix run github:hardenedlinux/nixpkgs-hardenedlinux#deepsea -- --config template.
